meanings.definition: The quality or state of being monstrous or outrageous.
meanings.sent1: The enormities of the giant's size frightened the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The enormities of the crime shocked the entire town.
meanings.sent3: The enormities of the situation made everyone gasp in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: The enormities of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The enormities of the dragon's roar echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: A monstrous offense or evil act.
meanings.sent1: The king was appalled by the enormities committed by his advisor.
meanings.sent2: The enormities of the war crimes haunted the survivors for years.
meanings.sent3: The enormities of the prank were revealed when the truth came out.
meanings.sent4: The enormities of betrayal cut deep into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The enormities of the villain's plan were finally exposed.
